briefTitle: Big Data and Text-mining Technologies Applied for Breast Cancer Medical Data Analysis
officialTitle: SENOMETRY : Big Data and Text-mining Technologies Applied for Breast Cancer Medical Data Analysis
primaryOutcomeMeasure: Validate the reliability of a computer-based, automatic information retrieval method specific to medical records from breast cancer multidisciplinary meetings
eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* Majority (age \> 18)
* Malignant breast tumors
* signed informed consent

Exclusion Criteria:

* Benign breast pathology
* Patients not initially treated at the Hôpitaux Universitaires de Strasbourg
